ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Re: How do you get married on evequest?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, they do keep records of when people request to have a wedding done, as long as you petition early enough in advance (one week).  That doesn t
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "tundrawyrm" <no_reply@yahoogroups.com>
>
> But make sure a few times that the GM will be there. They
> dont keep records of this stuff so petition and make sure that the Gm
> you are talking to can personally do the service.

Actually, they do keep records of when people request to have a wedding
done, as long as you petition early enough in advance (one week). That
doesn't mean that they will always be able to do a wedding, though. If
there are a lot of petitions (and not many guides on), they aren't going to
stop just to do a wedding, even if it was scheduled.

Erik Johnson
